data.title: Margaret Joan Huffman

data.text:
She was born in Akron on July 24, 1926, and lived in Elyria for most of her life. Mrs. Huffman was a bookkeeper for the Lorain Credit Bureau. She was a member of the Pilgrim United Church of Christ and enjoyed reading, cooking, traveling and spending time with her family. Survivors include her daughters, Sue Dahanos of Elyria, with whom she lived, and Beverly Barr of Beachwood; brothers Jim Hissam of Chagrin Falls and Edwin Hissam of Louisville, Ky.; and seven grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. She was preceded in death by her husband, Albert Huffman, in 1989; parents Bert and Clara (nee Frye) Hissam; and two brothers and one sister. Friends may call Monday from 4 p.m. until time of services at 5 p.m. at the Reichlin Roberts Funeral Home, 327 Cleveland St., Elyria. Burial will be in Ridgehill Memorial Park, Amherst Township. Memorial contributions may be made to CHP Regional Foundation, New Life Hospice, 3700 Kolbe Road, Lorain, OH 44053.

Originally Published: January 29, 2006 at 9:21 a.m.
